skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Experienced with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, React Native, TailwindCSS, Bootstrap, Vite, and WordPress. Skilled in building responsive and interactive interfaces with attention to accessibility, usability, and performance. Mobile-first development.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Proficient in Python, Node.js, Jinja, and RESTful API development. Deployed applications using Heroku, Render, Netlify, and Google Cloud. Skilled in Git, GitHub, and version control workflows, CLI tools, automation, and server-side rendering practices with structured logic.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Skilled in Adobe tools and Canva for UI mockups and visual assets. Knowledgeable in color theory, layout systems, typography, and wireframing. Focused on creating user-centered designs that are visually appealing and intuitive, ensuring effective navigation and usability.

skills.title: DataBase Management
skills.description: Experienced with MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and SQLite. Familiar with schema design, relational and non-relational data, queries, joins, and data migration. Able to integrate databases into full-stack applications and manage them efficiently and securely in production.

portfolio.title: Kitty House Adoption website
portfolio.description: Kitty House is a web application I developed for managing cat adoption listings. It was built using Flask for the back end and JavaScript for dynamic front-end interactions, with external APIs integrated to enhance functionality. The project focuses on clean design, usability, and practical application of full-stack development skills. It allowed me to deepen my experience working with Python-based web frameworks, RESTful APIs, and client-server communication.

portfolio.title: Personal Website
portfolio.description: This is my Personal Website. It is a React-based web application I built to showcase my journey as a developer, highlight my projects, and share my story. Using React, JavaScript, and CSS, I created a clean, responsive, and user-friendly interface that presents my skills, experiences, and passions clearly. The site serves as a central hub to connect with others and document my ongoing growth in software development.

portfolio.title: Car Inventory
portfolio.description: Car Inventory is a full-stack web application developed using React for the front end and PostgreSQL for database management. It allows users to add, update, and delete cars from an inventory through an intuitive and responsive interface. This project demonstrates dynamic data handling, state management, and seamless integration between the front end and a relational database, enabling efficient tracking and management of vehicle data.

certification.title: Software Engineering Certificate
certification.description: Completed a Software Engineering bootcamp, earning certifications in CSS, TypeScript, React, JavaScript, Node.js, Flask, HTML, Python, and SQL. Gained hands-on experience building full-stack applications and mastering key web development technologies. Developed practical skills in both front-end and back-end frameworks, preparing for real-world software projects and industry demands.
